text: @RepAdamSchiff I don't blame Trump for COVID19. I blame him for replacing the Obama pandemic response unit with a unit that failed- no PPE, tests, capacity, tracing. So we shut down the Country to buy time and STILL no testing & tracing capacity to reopen safely. I blame him very much for that.
